attributes.action: Make Sharia Law and their Courts illegal in the UK.
attributes.background: Under UK law it is a major crime to commit rape but under Sharia law it is not, especially when it involves infidels.

rejection.details:
Everyone who lives in the UK is already subject to UK law, including the law against rape, so we're not sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/203740
